text.1895: [01] ``yo kho, sabhiya, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m  dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, so cattaaro  maase parivasati; catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu  pabbaajenti, upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. api ca mettha  puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti.

text.1899: [03] eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m  caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi ^a^P0.0103^ea^  bhikkhusatehi yena aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo tadavasari.  assosi ^a^T0.0438^ea^ kho ke.niyo ja.tilo ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa  bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi aapa.na.m anuppatto.  ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m ^a^M0.0364^ea^ eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa'ti {bhagavaa (syaa0 pii0)}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m  sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  pavedeti. so dhamma.m desati aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m  pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^V0.0165^ea^ parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m  hotii''ti.
text.1900: [03] atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ke.niya.m  ja.tila.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi  sampaha.msesi. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m  bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca --  ``mahaa kho, ke.niya, bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^P0.0104^ea^ a.d.dhate.lasaani  bhikkhusataani; tva~nca braahma.nesu ^a^T0.0439^ea^ abhippasanno''ti.
text.1901: [03] dutiyampi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``ki~ncaapi, bho gotama, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani  bhikkhusataani, aha~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno; adhivaasetu me bhava.m  gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. dutiyampi kho  bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa kho, ke.niya,  bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani; tva~nca braahma.nesu  abhippasanno''ti.
text.1902: [03] tatiyampi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``ki~ncaapi, bho gotama, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani  bhikkhusataani, aha~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno, adhivaasetu {adhivaasetveva (sii0)} me bhava.m  gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi  bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavato adhivaasana.m  viditvaa ^a^M0.0365^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa yena sako assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite aamantesi -- ``su.nantu me bhavanto  mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa, sama.no me gotamo nimantito svaatanaaya  bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena, yena me kaayaveyyaava.tika.m kareyyaathaa''ti.  ``eva.m, bho''ti kho ke.niyassa ja.tilassa mittaamaccaa  ~naatisaalohitaa ke.niyassa ja.tilassa pa.tissutvaa appekacce uddhanaani  kha.nanti, appekacce ka.t.thaani phaalenti, appekacce bhaajanaani dhovanti,  appekacce udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapenti, appekacce aasanaani pa~n~naapenti.  ke.niyo pana ja.tilo saama.myeva ma.n.dalamaa.la.m ^a^T0.0440^ea^ pa.tiyaadeti.
text.1903: [03] tena kho pana samayena selo braahma.no aapa.ne pa.tivasati,  ti.n.na.m ^a^P0.0105^ea^ vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m ^a^V0.0166^ea^  saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no   lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo, tii.ni ca maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti.
text.1904: [03] tena kho pana samayena ke.niyo ja.tilo sele braahma.ne  abhippasanno hoti. atha kho selo braahma.no tiihi maa.navakasatehi  parivuto ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena ke.niyassa  ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho selo braahma.no  ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assame {ke.nissamiye ja.tile (sii0 pii0)}   appekacce uddhanaani kha.nante...pe0... appekacce aasanaani pa~n~napente, ke.niya.m pana ja.tila.m saama.myeva  ma.n.dalamaa.la.m pa.tiyaadenta.m. disvaana ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca --  ``ki.m nu kho bhoto ke.niyassa aavaaho vaa bhavissati, vivaaho vaa  bhavissati, mahaaya~n~no vaa paccupa.t.thito, raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo  bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayenaa''ti?
text.1905: [03] ``na me, bho sela, aavaaho vaa bhavissati vivaaho vaa, naapi  raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m  balakaayena; api ca kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito. atthi sama.no  gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m ^a^M0.0366^ea^   caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi ^a^T0.0441^ea^ bhikkhusatehi  aapa.na.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana ^a^P0.0106^ea^ bhavanta.m  gotama.m...pe0... buddho bhagavaati. so me nimantito svaatanaaya bhatta.m  saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. ``buddhoti, bho ke.niya, vadesi''?  ``buddhoti, bho sela, vadaami''. ``buddhoti, bho ke.niya, vadesi''?  ``buddhoti, bho sela, vadaamii''ti.
text.1906: [03] atha kho selassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``ghosopi kho  eso dullabho lokasmi.m yadida.m buddhoti. aagataani kho panamhaaka.m  mantesu dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa  dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati raajaa hoti  cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii  janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta  ratanaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m, hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m,  ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m, pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m.  parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa  parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena  dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado {vivattacchaddo (sii0  pii0)}. kaha.m pana, bho ke.niya, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati ^a^T0.0442^ea^ araha.m  sammaasambuddho''ti?

text.3917: [22] maggo so paara.m gamanaaya, tasmaa paaraayana.m iti..
text.3922: [22] nikkaamo nibbano {nibbuto (syaa0)} naago, kissa hetu musaa bha.ne..
text.3928: [22] anaasavo sabbadukkhapahiino, saccavhayo ^a^T0.0552^ea^ brahme upaasito  me..
text.3931: [22] eva.m paha.m appadasse pahaaya, mahodadhi.m ha.msoriva  ajjhapatto..
text.3935: [22] sabba.m ta.m itihitiha.m, sabba.m ta.m takkava.d.dhana.m..
text.3955: [21] ``passaami ^a^M0.0451^ea^ na.m manasaa cakkhunaava, rattindiva.m braahma.na  appamatto.
text.3956: [22] namassamaano vivasemi ratti.m, teneva ma~n~naami  avippavaasa.m..
text.3958: [21] ``saddhaa ca piiti ca mano sati ca, naapenti me  gotamasaasanamhaa.
text.3959: [22] ya.m ya.m disa.m vajati bhuuripa~n~no, sa tena teneva  natohamasmi..
text.3961: [21] ``ji.n.nassa ^a^P0.0222^ea^ me dubbalathaamakassa,  teneva kaayo na paleti tattha.
text.3962: [22] sa.mkappayantaaya {sa.mkappayattaaya (sii0)} vajaami nicca.m, mano hi me braahma.na tena  yutto..
text.3964: [21] ``pa"nke sayaano pariphandamaano, diipaa diipa.m upaplavi.m {upallavi.m  (syaa0 niddesa)}.
text.3967: [21] ``yathaa ahuu vakkali muttasaddho, bhadraavudho aa.lavi  gotamo ca.
text.3974: [21] ``adhideve ^a^V0.0249^ea^ abhi~n~naaya, sabba.m vedi varovara.m {paro  vara.m (sii0 syaa0), paro para.m (niddesa)}.
text.3978: [22] addhaa gamissaami na mettha ka"nkhaa, eva.m ma.m dhaarehi  adhimuttacitta''nti..
text.3982: [21] urago ^a^M0.0452^ea^ {imaa uddaanagaathaayo sii0 pii0 potthakesu na  santi} dhaniyopi ca, khaggavisaa.no kasi ca.
text.3983: [27] cundo bhavo punadeva, vasalo ca kara.niiya~nca.
text.3987: [22] desito cakkhumataa vimalena, suyyati vaggavaro  uragoti..
text.3990: [22] naavaa {naatha (ka0)} ki.msiilau.t.thahano ca, raahulo ^a^T0.0555^ea^ ca punapi va"ngiiso..
text.3996: [22] sabhiya.m ke.niyameva sallanaamo, vaase.t.thavaro kaalikopi ca..
text.3998: [21] naalakasuttavaro suvibhatto, ta.m anupassii tathaa punadeva.
text.4010: [21] ubhayavaasamaagatiyamhi {ubhaya.m vaa pu.n.nasamaagata.m yamhi (syaa0)},  dvaadasayojaniyaa parisaaya.
